skins.shipDescription: Atlanta-class light cruiser ¨C Juneau, Hull Number CL-52!
skins.selfIntroduction: I-I'm Juneau, an Atlanta-class anti-aircraft cruiser... Because I have high anti-air capabilities, I was assigned to a Task Force, but I'm actually scared of getting shot... Unfortunately I couldn't make it back home from Espiritu Santo...
skins.acquisition: I-I'm Juneau... I'm a cruiser... I'm scared of pain... *Sob* And I'm scared of you, Commander...!
skins.login: C-Commander... I'll always be w-waiting for you here...
skins.details: The... old injury to my foot? Well... my foot's still a bit stiff, but I won't ever let myself drag everyone else down...!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I want to be brave... But it's really hard...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, have I annoyed you in any way...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Pl... please be gentle... I'm very susceptible to pain...
